snippet: As chaos persists in the city’s streets, Cairo’s subway remains a model of efficiency, order and dependability for the three million people who ride it every day.
abstract: Cairo Journal: though chaos persists in the city’s streets, Cairo’s subway remains a model of efficiency, order and dependability for the three million people who ride it every day.
lead_paragraph: As chaos persists in the city’s streets, Cairo’s subway remains a model of efficiency, order and dependability for the three million people who ride it every day.

headline.seo: Cairo’s Subway Is Efficient, Orderly and Dependable
headline.main: Underground, Everything That Life Above Is Not
